content:
I just saw a thread that suggests that IGs for Sept ballot should be publishing on their canonical URLS (https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179252-IG-creation/topic/IG.20Build.20and.20canonical.20URL) and not at build.fhir.org.

Our IG is publishing here: https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/HAI-LTCF/

But the QA page says:
"HL7 Publication check:
All ok (path - http://hl7.org/fhir/us/hai-ltcf/2019Sep)"

Is it really "all ok", or do I have to do something else?
You mean, the last step to get it published at the canonical URL is Grahame/Lynn?
